name: soullessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows no human influence or qualities: The majority of locals have left the area, leaving the new stadiums soullessly empty. High-rise buildings stand soullessly in the distance.
More examplesFewer examplesHer office is on the top floor of a soullessly white-walled office building.Innocent men and women have been exploited by soullessly greedy politicians.The music was played soullessly by the school orchestra.Each track on the album is expertly constructed and soullessly executed.
